name: Laser Raiser
description:
Laser Raiser -- my submission for 7DFPS Jam 2020.

Run around and shoot mysterious enemies. Humanoid enemies will activate their shields but you can break their guard with a well-time melee attack (Alt-Fire w/ Shotgun) and open them up for extra damage.

Controls: W/A/S/DMoveSpaceJump / Double Jump
ShiftSprintLeft MouseFireRight MouseAlt-FireEscapeMenu

Project based on Unity's FPS Microgame sample.
